description: This file declares the class FbSettingsImplementation, which implements the interfaces Exchange::IFbSettings and Exchange::IConfiguration for managing various device and user settings within the WPEFramework plugin architecture. It includes methods for configuration, device info, settings subscriptions, and other related functionalities.

classes.name: FbSettingsImplementation
classes.description: Main class implementing device and user settings interfaces for the WPEFramework plugin.

classes.name: EventRegistrationJob
classes.description: Nested class handling asynchronous event registration and notification dispatching.

methods.name: HandleAppEventNotifier
methods.description: Handles notifications for app events related to settings.

methods.name: Configure
methods.description: Configures the settings implementation with the plugin shell.

methods.name: GetDeviceMake
methods.description: Retrieves the device manufacturer information.

methods.name: GetDeviceName
methods.description: Retrieves the device name.

methods.name: SetDeviceName
methods.description: Sets the device name.

methods.name: GetDeviceSku
methods.description: Retrieves the device SKU.

methods.name: GetCountryCode
methods.description: Retrieves the device's country code.

methods.name: SetCountryCode
methods.description: Sets the device's country code.

methods.name: SubscribeOnCountryCodeChanged
methods.description: Subscribes to changes in the country code.

methods.name: GetTimeZone
methods.description: Retrieves the current time zone setting.

methods.name: SetTimeZone
methods.description: Sets the device's time zone.

methods.name: SubscribeOnTimeZoneChanged
methods.description: Subscribes to changes in the time zone.

methods.name: GetSecondScreenFriendlyName
methods.description: Gets the friendly name of the second screen.

methods.name: SubscribeOnFriendlyNameChanged
methods.description: Subscribes to changes in the friendly name.

methods.name: SubscribeOnDeviceNameChanged
methods.description: Subscribes to device name change events.

methods.name: GetLanguage
methods.description: Retrieves the current UI language.

methods.name: SubscribeOnLanguageChanged
methods.description: Subscribes to language change events.

methods.name: GetLocale
methods.description: Gets the current locale setting.

methods.name: SetLocale
methods.description: Sets the locale.

methods.name: SubscribeOnLocaleChanged
methods.description: Subscribes to locale change events.

methods.name: GetPreferredAudioLanguages
methods.description: Retrieves preferred audio languages.

methods.name: SetPreferredAudioLanguages
methods.description: Sets preferred audio languages.

methods.name: SubscribeOnPreferredAudioLanguagesChanged
methods.description: Subscribes to changes in preferred audio languages.

methods.name: SetVoiceGuidanceEnabled
methods.description: Enables or disables voice guidance.

methods.name: SetVoiceGuidanceSpeed
methods.description: Sets the speed of voice guidance.

methods.name: SubscribeOnAudioDescriptionSettingsChanged
methods.description: Subscribes to changes in audio description settings.

methods.name: GetAudioDescriptionSettings
methods.description: Retrieves current audio description settings as JSON.

methods.name: GetAudioDescriptionsEnabled
methods.description: Checks if audio descriptions are enabled.

methods.name: SetAudioDescriptionsEnabled
methods.description: Enables or disables audio descriptions.

methods.name: SubscribeOnAudioDescriptionsEnabledChanged
methods.description: Subscribes to changes in audio descriptions enabled state.

methods.name: GetHighContrastUI
methods.description: Checks if high contrast UI mode is enabled.

methods.name: SubscribeOnHighContrastUIChanged
methods.description: Subscribes to high contrast UI mode changes.

methods.name: GetClosedCaptionsEnabled
methods.description: Checks if closed captions are enabled.

methods.name: SetClosedCaptionsEnabled
methods.description: Enables or disables closed captions.

methods.name: SubscribeOnClosedCaptionsEnabledChanged
methods.description: Subscribes to closed captions enabled state changes.

methods.name: GetClosedCaptionsPreferredLanguages
methods.description: Retrieves preferred closed captions languages.

methods.name: SetClosedCaptionsPreferredLanguages
methods.description: Sets preferred closed captions languages.

methods.name: SubscribeOnClosedaptionsPreferredLanguagesChanged
methods.description: Subscribes to changes in closed captions preferred languages.

methods.name: SubscribeOnClosedCaptionsSettingsChanged
methods.description: Subscribes to changes in closed captions settings.

methods.name: GetVoiceGuidanceNavigationHints
methods.description: Checks if voice guidance navigation hints are enabled.

methods.name: SetVoiceGuidanceNavigationHints
methods.description: Enables or disables voice guidance navigation hints.

methods.name: SubscribeOnVoiceGuidanceNavigationHintsChanged
methods.description: Subscribes to navigation hints changes.

methods.name: GetVoiceGuidanceRate
methods.description: Retrieves voice guidance rate.

methods.name: SetVoiceGuidanceRate
methods.description: Sets voice guidance rate.

methods.name: SubscribeOnVoiceGuidanceRateChanged
methods.description: Subscribes to rate change events.

methods.name: GetVoiceGuidanceEnabled
methods.description: Checks if voice guidance is enabled.

methods.name: SubscribeOnVoiceGuidanceEnabledChanged
methods.description: Subscribes to voice guidance enabled state changes.

methods.name: GetVoiceGuidanceSpeed
methods.description: Gets the speed of voice guidance.

methods.name: SubscribeOnVoiceGuidanceSpeedChanged
methods.description: Subscribes to voice guidance speed changes.

methods.name: SubscribeOnVoiceGuidanceSettingsChanged
methods.description: Subscribes to overall voice guidance setting changes.

methods.description: unavailable

methods.description: unavailable

methods.description: unavailable
